title: Man, Bird, and Fruit II
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. Mr. [1901-1982] and Mrs. Charles Denby (Rosamond Reed Denby) [1906-1988], Sewickley, PA, by June 1968 until September 25, 1969 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1969 [2].

Notes:
[1]. See copy of correspondence dated June 7, 1968 in curatorial file. The painting was received at Carnegie Institute from Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby in August 1968 and was included in "Exhibition of Paintings, Watercolors, and Drawings by Carl-Henning Pedersen" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh PA, October - December 1968 (no. 57, illustrated in the catalogue.) 
[2]. The painting remained at the museum after the 1968 exhibition in note [2] and was accessioned on September 25, 1969.
